text: a special right or advantage that a particular person or group of people has.” It can also refer to “the rights and advantages that rich and powerful people in a society have.
Social class, schooling, economic status, gender, racial, religion, abilities, educational.
Power, higher income, better grades, more knowledge, improved health facilities, safety and security.
Bigger gap between the poor and the rich, increased differences between social classes, unfairness, lack of trust, lack of cooperation, misuse of power.
Private vs public schools, high rise building vs slum areas, an abundance of food vs basic food, a fleet of cars vs public transportation, business class vs economy tickets.
